mdRecord.dcterms:title: Specific gravity balance set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: August Sauter [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The set is in enclosed in a wooden box and includes a brass balance, hooks, and weights. The set also includes a #683-1 Reimann Plummet, "For the Determination of the Specific Gravity of Liquids Calibrated at 15 celsius".
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
